originalText.text: Save your time & money and go somewhere else. Go to a dentist who actually knows what he is doing. I'm amazed that this place is still in business!

text.text: Save your time & money and go somewhere else. Go to a dentist who actually knows what he is doing. I'm amazed that this place is still in business!

originalText.text: I would never, ever do business with a doctor that prides himself on taking full advantage of a service provider.  This doctor has owed us over $1,400 for services performed and has YET to pay.  If the doctor treats his patients like he treats his vendors, which I expect he does, i would strongly suggest searching for a new dentist.  He avoids numerous calls to his staff and always has an excuse why he can not pay his bill.  Avoid doing business with an individual that does not stand by his word.  We have forwarded our collections to our lawyer.

originalText.text: This dentist has a disgusting bedside manner. Very nasty, very rude. He's really straight. He must have gotten his dental degree from some little chop shop. Please trust me. Avoid going to this dentist. His reception is disgusting equally they work together so that makes perfect sense. He never has outside ours and his reception is advises you. You come in accommodate us. We do not accommodate anyone so very nasty. Avoid this into office as much as possible. Trust me find your new dentist cuz if this is your only choice you don't really want anything good to happen for you.

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience. The staff was very welcoming and helped me though my anxiety. Dr.Ahmed was absolutely amazing with me explained everything as he went though everything.Letty the assistant was a blessing she was God send  she was amazing very patient with me . She was a blessing from God . I enjoyed my vistes

originalText.text: I was never told not to get here early. I was hit by a car and looking for an actually good dentist close to home who understands me and can communicate well and isn’t hard in my mouth. I am currently waiting outside because they are having lunch. I have no problem with lunch my thing is forewarn customers to not come early. I hope and pray they don’t mess up my mouth with X-rays or the work. I also hope they don’t try to remove all my teeth and their answer is false teeth.
